means: [男子名] [英格兰人姓氏] 巴普蒂斯特来源于中世纪教名，取自St Joh,the Baptist,希腊语，含义是“浸，洗”(to dip,wash)+ist,即施洗礼者

sentence.Network_en: His father was a Baptist minister.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的父亲是浸礼会牧师。

sentence.Network_en: HKBU ( Hong Kong Baptist University ) was founded by the Baptist Convention of Hong Kong in 1956 as the Hong Kong Baptist College.
sentence.Network_cn: 香港浸会大学前身为香港浸会学院,在一九五六年由香港浸信会联会创立.

sentence.Network_en: " You talk like a Baptist preacher making a recruiting speech.
sentence.Network_cn: " 你这话很象是个牧师在发表招兵演说了.

entry.def: A Baptist is a Christian who believes that people should not be baptized until they are old enough to understand the meaning of baptism.

entry.tran: 浸礼会教派的；浸礼会教友的
entry.def: Baptist means belonging or relating to Baptists.

means.word_mean: 1. of or pertaining to or characteristic of the Baptist church;
